top_signals.headline: Bank Indonesia Holds BI-Rate at 5.75% to Support Rupiah Stability
top_signals.impact: The central bank maintained its benchmark rate amid global uncertainty, balancing growth support with currency stability. Foreign reserves remain robust at $151.8B, providing FX intervention capacity.

top_signals.headline: JCI Index Resilient Above 7,200 as Foreign Flows Turn Positive
top_signals.impact: Jakarta Composite Index maintains strength driven by banking and consumer sectors. Net foreign buying resumed as EM sentiment improves on Fed pivot expectations. YTD performance +2.3%.

top_signals.headline: Indonesia Q3 GDP Grows 5.12% YoY, Beats Consensus Estimates
top_signals.impact: Economic expansion driven by household consumption (+4.9%) and fixed investment (+5.1%). Manufacturing PMI at 52.3 signals continued expansion. Full-year growth projected at 5.05-5.15%.

top_signals.headline: Federal Reserve Signals Potential December Rate Cut Amid Cooling Inflation
top_signals.impact: FOMC minutes suggest committee members see conditions for further easing. Core PCE trending toward 2.5% target. Markets pricing 65% probability of 25bp cut in December.

top_signals.headline: Indonesian Rupiah Stabilizes at 15,850/USD on Trade Surplus
top_signals.impact: Currency finds support from continued trade surplus ($10.5B Q3) and BI intervention. Carry trade dynamics remain favorable vs USD. Key resistance at 16,000 level.

top_signals.headline: Indonesian Banks Report Strong NIM Expansion in Q3 Results
top_signals.impact: Major banks (BBCA, BBRI, BMRI) posted 12-15% earnings growth with NIMs expanding to 5.2-5.8%. Loan growth accelerated to 11.5% YoY. NPL ratios stable at 2.1-2.4%.

top_signals.headline: S&P 500 Approaches All-Time High on AI Optimism and Rate Cut Bets
top_signals.impact: Index trading near 6,000 level as tech sector leads. Magnificent 7 stocks contribute 60% of YTD gains. Earnings growth re-accelerating to +8% YoY in Q4.

top_signals.headline: US 10-Year Treasury Yield Falls to 4.35% on Dovish Fed Outlook
top_signals.impact: Bond yields decline as markets reprice Fed trajectory. Real yields at +2.0% remain attractive for fixed income allocations. Duration positioning shifts to neutral.

top_signals.headline: China Manufacturing PMI Expands to 51.5, Supporting EM Sentiment
top_signals.impact: Factory activity strengthens on stimulus measures and export recovery. Positive read-through for Asian supply chains and commodity demand. EM currencies rally.

top_signals.headline: Brent Crude Holds at $78/bbl as OPEC+ Maintains Production Discipline
top_signals.impact: Oil prices stabilize on balanced supply-demand outlook. OPEC+ compliance remains high at 95%. Inventory levels normalize. Range-bound trading expected near term.

top_signals.headline: Abercrombie shares soar 37% on Hollister growth, strong earnings beat
top_signals.impact: Abercrombie & Fitch's namesake banner is slowing down, but revenue is ramping up at Hollister, its teen-focused brand.

top_signals.headline: Abercrombie shares soar 18% on Hollister growth, strong earnings beat
top_signals.impact: Abercrombie & Fitch's namesake banner is slowing down, but revenue is ramping up at Hollister, its teen-focused brand.

top_signals.headline: Dick's Sporting Goods to shutter some Foot Locker stores to protect profits
top_signals.impact: Dick's Sporting Goods acquired Foot Locker for $2.4 billion. To ensure the tie-up doesn't become a drag on profits, the company is shrinking its footprint.

top_signals.headline: Fed Chair Powell’s Allies Provide Opening for December Rate Cut
top_signals.impact: A divided committee, missing data and a whiff of stagflation leave Powell to choose between two paths—each with drawbacks

top_signals.headline: Over a third of Black Friday sales aren't really discounts, study finds: 'There's some trickery happening'
top_signals.impact: Prices fluctuate all the time. A low price on a particular item may not be exclusive to Black Friday sales, experts say.

top_signals.headline: Thanksgiving gas prices could be the lowest in years — if you adjust for inflation. But consumers are still on edge.
top_signals.impact: As American consumers continue to fret over rising food prices, the cost of gasoline is less of a worry.

top_signals.headline: Waton Financial Limited Launches TradingWTF, a DePearl™ Powered AI Trading Platform Designed to Reshape How Investors Trade - Waton Financial  ( NASDAQ:WTF )
top_signals.impact: HONG KONG, Nov. 26, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- Waton Financial Limited ( NASDAQ:WTF ) , a provider of securities brokerage and financial technology services ( "Waton" or the "Company" ) , today announced the launch of "TradingWTF," an investment and trading app that integrates AI capabilities ...

top_signals.headline: Advanced Micro Devices' Latest Meltdown Heightens Speculative Fervor For Direxion's AMUU, AMDD ETFs - Direxion Daily AMD Bear 1X Shares  ( NASDAQ:AMDD ) , Direxion Daily AMD Bull 2X Shares  ( NASDAQ:AMUU )
top_signals.impact: Depending on when the inquiry is asked and to whom, Advanced Micro Devices Inc ( NASDAQ:AMD ) is either a critical player in artificial intelligence - and thus deserves a strong valuation premium - or is an overplayed enterprise that has long overstayed its welcome.

top_signals.headline: Netflix's Dominance Finally Encounters Serious Inquiries, Bolstering Intrigue For Direxion's NFXL, NFXS ETFs - Direxion Daily NFLX Bear 1X Shares  ( NASDAQ:NFXS ) , Direxion Daily NFLX Bull 2X Shares  ( NASDAQ:NFXL )
top_signals.impact: Carrying the benchmark for modern entertainment content, Netflix Inc. ( NASDAQ:NFLX ) can arguably be referred to as the only streaming service with true global penetration. According to the company's website, its programs reach over half a billion people in more than 190 countries.

top_signals.headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Apple Stock - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL )
top_signals.impact: Apple Inc. ( NASDAQ:AAPL ) shares reached an all-time high on Tuesday, closing at $276.97. The company recently announced plans to roll out three new iPhone models within the next three years, marking a major transformation in the history of the device.

top_signals.headline: Broadcom To Rally Around 13%? Here Are 10 Top Analyst Forecasts For Wednesday - Broadcom  ( NASDAQ:AVGO ) , Autodesk  ( NASDAQ:ADSK )
top_signals.impact: Top Wall Street analysts changed their outlook on these top names. For a complete view of all analyst rating changes, including upgrades and downgrades, please see our analyst ratings page. Keybanc cut Workday, Inc. ( NASDAQ:WDAY ) price target from $285 to $260.

top_signals.headline: Why Is Li Auto Stock Falling Wednesday? - Li Auto  ( NASDAQ:LI )
top_signals.impact: Li Auto Inc. ( NASDAQ:LI ) stock fell on Wednesday after the Chinese EV maker reported a steep decline in fiscal third-quarter 2025 results, weighed by lower deliveries, margin compression, and costs tied to a major vehicle recall.

top_signals.headline: Black Friday is most popular with Gen Z, even as the holiday loses its shine, new survey finds
top_signals.impact: A new AT&T survey found that members of Generation Z are the biggest Black Friday shoppers, while older generations shop closer to Christmas.

top_signals.headline: Mortgage rates fall sharply on expectations of a Fed rate cut. Will they keep on dropping from here?
top_signals.impact: Mortgage rates took a dive on Tuesday, pushing the 30-year rate to the lowest level in a month.

top_signals.headline: JPMorgan just one-upped the most bullish call on Wall Street for the S&P 500 next year
top_signals.impact: JPMorgan has an optimistic view on U.S. stock markets next year, and AI momentum will be playing a starring role.
